title_narrative: DRC/DDG Demining Afghanistan 2014-2016 - AFG land mine clearing, DDG
description_narrative: The DDG "Humanitarian Mine Action support to the Afghan National Strategy through clearance and enhanced quality control" project 2014-2016 contains four components: 1) release of suspect ground through clearance activities in the Samangan and Balkh provinces; 2) Mine Risk Education prior to, during and after the completion of clearance; 3) Baseline studies and impact monitoring; and 4) capacity building and training of local staff to ensure quality and increase national ownership.
